title: gccgo: export function argment names to .gox files as 6g does it
body:
That's a feature request. It's not required for the compiler, but for tools that do
contextual help (i.e. autocompletion) it may add some value.

Showing:
    func CopyImage(x int, y int, w int, h int, src *Image) *Image
instead of:
    func CopyImage(int, int, int, int, *Image) *Image
